desc: I need an Android app.  I already have a design for it, I just need it to be built.  Notes: The server preferred is on a SHARED Linux server with python from linode (fallback and not ideal is Linux but on GoDaddy so PHP and other standard languages available on that platform).Images pulled from a folder that's stored online on a server and displayed in a grid in the app, clickable to enlarge, and clickable to move to the next picture. Share button for each picture.Movie container for displaying specific streaming movies from a specific Vimeo profile. Pull from list on server for updating.Geolocation tracking and analytics: each install of the app needs a unique number generated. Gps info sent and stored on server, most likely when images are viewed and then when shared and by what method, and a gps log pulled from phone on regularly intervals, for analytics and displayed on a map on server. Data analytics needs to know where images are shown and shared in relation to regular gps data of not shown images for marketing geolocation financial knowledge.An index page leading to a few standard html text type page views with written resume and artist bio content, with an on the fly pdf creation of that same page available to be sharable. Page will be updatable by being pulled from server.
title: Android Mobile development with python server backend for content updating, geolocation data a must. Video and image container, basic text webview etc

desc: A business mining game but with a few unique twists compared to some other attempts to make athis a compelling game on this subject. Hoping to pick up on the popularity of minecraft, terraria and cypto-currencies.I had this idea over 30 years ago and released a version on the Atari ST written in BASIC so some aspects of the graphical puzzles involved have previously been written and refined by me.I have already spent about 3 months part time getting a working exe written in C in Codeblocks with current devices in mind that has 10-1000 AI players successfully (it doesn't crash after numerous test runs) playing against each other for 1000 rounds.Another 3 or so part time months I've spent designing what I believe are the various screen layouts needed in the game for mobiles. You can see these at [url removed, login to view]Next up I am going to start learning Unity so I can create a better graphic environment to test the gameplay development and add one other minor feature to the mix nd hopefully this is the best platform to create the cross platform versions into the marketplace.So I am looking for anyone who has developed a game that has completed a succesful regular turn cycle game that can help guide or provide the code required for this or refer me to any particular reference points / books / languages that I need to get familiar with.  i.e. say every hour on the hour there's a game players revenue generation process for the mines you have built in the game to generate cash to spend.Not sure if this is the best place to find such help, I'm not in a hurry as you can see by the time taken to date to get to this stage.
title: Unity developer advisor for Turn based MMOG for Mobiles and PC

Scoring and feedback based on child’s performance•	Dashboard for parents to review kids performance and set objectives•	Strong Illustrator within the team or able to work with an external Illustrator.•	Apple pencil compatibility•	Subscriptions•	Purchases within application for additional content•	Ability to add further purchasable content at a later date•	Administrative dashboard to update content within application and monitor app metricsIdeal candidate:•	4.5 -5 stars rating•	Experience making polished applications•	Very good written and spoken English•	Highly skilled developer•	Long term partnership**Please note** consideration will only be given to those who have taken the time to understand the project requirements.

desc: 50% Payment of the project will be made after the work completion and and 50% after hand over the source code to us.No project will be awarded and no milestone will be created without checking 50% of your work on our android app.If you can not fulfill above requirements then no need to waste my precious time.I am looking for an Android App for controlling Smart Home Automation Products, in which we want to give options of Bluetooth Controlled also, Wifi Control also.There will be two options in the beginning of the app on the very first page.1. (Bluetooth Controlled (For Shutter and Gates and Curtains)When user select Bluetooth option then it should directly ask for the permission to connect Bluetooth with a Popup on screen and show open Bluetooth Devices. Its connected device will be Bluetooth HC-05.2. (WiFi Controlled for Home/Office Automation)When user select WiFi option then it should directly ask for the permission to connect WiFi with a Popup on screen and open WiFi.If use will select Bluetooth option then there should be an option to change the password of connected Bluetooth also.If use will select WiFi option then there should be an option to change the password of connected WiFi device also.Designing will be at ur end, Server we will provide. It should be connected to cloud.
